@@ -132,62 +142,37 @@ Samples are explained in detail [here][samples_readme].
 
 ### General
 
-When you interact with Azure Cognitive Search using this Java client library, errors returned by the service correspond to the same HTTP status codes returned for [REST API][rest_api] requests. For example, if you try to retrieve a document that doesn't exist in your index, a `404` error is returned, indicating `Not Found`.

nodes.bodyText: If you are preparing for this to be the last PR before release you may want to stamp in the date here instead of Unreleased.
Did you make the change to emit application/json;odata.metadata=none for the Accept header of each request from SearchIndexClient? If so, you shouldn't need this anymore.
I took over Alan's PR as he is OOF, I found it is not possible to checkin his repo recently. As this is internal use class. We can leave the change for next release.
